name: Chill Gamer
briefDescription: The platform where logged in users can add review for their favorite games
detailedDescription: This project enables users to filter game reviews by genres to quickly find relevant content.
challenges: Ensuring the filtering logic handles multiple genres and updates the UI in real-time.
Managing the state efficiently for large datasets.
shortcomings: Currently supports filtering by a single genre only.
Does not have a search bar to combine filters with keyword search.
plannedImprovements: Integrating a search bar for more robust filtering.
